message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product but $90 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $70?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I have to make a living, so I can only go up to $85. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we settle at $78?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $82, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
